titleStmt.title: The Morning exercise [at] Cri[ppleg]ate, or, Several cases of conscience practically resolved by sundry ministers, September 1661.
titleStmt.author: Annesley, Samuel, 1620?-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Joshua Kirton and Nathaniel Webb ...,
